description:
App developers in the Android ecosystem can breathe a little easier knowing that Google is doubling down on platform security. Suzanne Frey – VP, Product, Trust & Growth for Android & Play at Google – has outlined a series of enhancements designed to make it simpler for developers to create secure apps while simultaneously fortifying... Read more »

The post Google bolsters Android security for app developers and users appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Google bolsters Android security for app developers and users
